metadata.title: CVE-2020-17523 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Apache Shiro before 1.7.1, when using Apache Shiro with Spring, a speciallycrafted HTTP request may cause an authentication bypass.

criterions.comment: shiro: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
